Muttley

Share
Email Print Adoption Poster

Large Male Greyhound

Located in Western Australia

Available for interstate adoption

Name: Muttley
Race Name: Reggae's Agius
D.O.B: 1st May 2009
Colour: White & Black
Sex: Male
Cats: No
Dogs: Yes large breed
Children: Yes
Other:
Muttley has been a joy to have in our family. He has been living with my husband and I, two female greyhounds and a male greyhound. He loves to play chase with the other dogs outside in the yard but at times also entertains himself by throwing and catching his own toys which is a sight to see!

He shows no food aggression, has learnt to only take a treat from us when his name is called. He loves to cuddle by putting his head onto your legs and under your arm where he would literally stand all day if you continued to pat him.

Although he does not live with a smaller dog, experiences when he has been taken out to mingle with other dogs, we have found he is a little too interested in them (as well as other animals such as chickens). He was cat tested and unfortunately he found the cat very interesting although he wasn't aggressive, his idea of play would put the cat in danger.

Muttley has character and lots of love to give, he doesn't just have his playful moments, he also displays incredible affection with the humans as well as the other greyhounds. We have been going through renovations and people have been coming in and out for weeks and he has introduced himself and then happily gone off to lay down in one of the dog beds or on the slate floor, so on that front he is no bother at all.

He hasn't had many walks yet he never displays hyper activeness, he will just play out back and tire himself out.

Having had him here at our house, I would recommend him to a family with Greyhounds/larger dogs or a family looking for their first dog. He is a memorable character and we look forward to him finding his forever home.

Adoption fee is $300 which includes Sterilization, C5 Vaccination, Microchip, Vet Check etc

Can be viewed in Thornlie
